short_summary: Application support ,Temporary Help Services. Invoice transparence upto 100% for feasibility analysis and automated expensing for resource intensive activities such as Air Mobility examinations and actions.
description: Requirement to provide Temporary Help Services support for Department of National Defense with certain limitations and special conditions. This organizations are in the National Capital Region (NCR).
full_summary:
# Invitation to Tender for Temporary Help Services

## Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Department of National Defense

### Tender Information

* **Tender Title:** S4999986 - Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Reference Number:** cb-49-9291610
* **Publication Date:** 2024-07-02
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-09T15:00:00
* **Procurement Category:** SRV

### Brief Description

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement (SA) for the National Capital Region (NCR). Successful suppliers will be selected through a competitive select tender process. The requirement falls under the following UNSPSC category: *80111600 - Temporary personnel services*.

### Scope of Work

The successful supplier will provide Temporary Help Services, including application support, to the Department of National Defense. The level of security required for this tender is NATO Secret.

### Requirements

* Suppliers must be registered under the CPSS (Canadian Public Procurement System)
* Suppliers must have a valid CSAM (Security Clearance for Official Functions): SECRET level
* Suppliers must be qualified under the following streams and categories:
	+ 5.1 Computer Application Support
* Suppliers must be members of the Supply Arrangement (SA) for the National Capital Region (NCR)

### Interested Suppliers

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc.
* ALTRUISTIC INFORMATICS CONSULTING INC.
* Intelliscient Inc
* MGIS Inc. & iGeoSpy Inc. in JV
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
* Orangutech Inc.
* Prologic Systems Ltd.
* Quarry Consulting Inc.
* Tech4soft Inc.
* TechWind Inc.
* Transatlantic Business Consulting Inc.

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be downloaded from the [Canada Buy](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41408/s4999986-rfp)-(en.pdf) website. The tender description, requirements, and additional information can be found in the corresponding attachment.

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact:

CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Tel: (613)
